root.cn: 农场里有各种水果，等着孩子们去发现哦，培养孩子的观察能力。 这里有美味可口的苹果、香蕉、桃子等，你想吃的水果都有，应有尽有，千万不要错过呦！涵盖的水果有： 浆果类：草莓，蓝莓，黑莓，桑葚，覆盆子，葡萄，青提，红提，水晶葡萄， 马奶子 柑橘类：砂糖橘，金橘，甜橙，脐橙，西柚，柚子，葡萄柚， 柠檬，文旦 核果类：桃子，李子，樱桃，杏，梅子，杨梅， 西梅，乌梅，红枣，海枣，蜜枣，橄榄，荔枝，龙眼（桂圆），槟榔 仁果类：苹果 ，梨 ，蛇果，海棠果，沙果，柿子，山竹，黑布林， 枇杷，杨桃，山楂，圣女果，无花果，白果，罗汉果，火龙果，猕猴桃 瓜类：西瓜，甜瓜，香瓜，哈密瓜，木瓜，乳瓜 其他：菠萝，芒果，板栗，椰子，奇异果，芭乐，榴莲，香蕉，甘蔗， 莲子，石榴，核桃
root.en: There are all kinds of fruits on the farm, waiting for the children to find out and cultivate their observation ability. Here are delicious apples, bananas, peaches and so on. You can have all the fruits you want. Don't miss them! Fruits covered include: berries: strawberry, blueberry, blackberry, mulberry, raspberry, grape, qingti, Hongti, crystal grape, milk orange: sugar orange, kumquat, sweet orange, navel orange, grapefruit, grapefruit, grapefruit, lemon, Wendan stone fruit: peach, plum, cherry, apricot, plum, bayberry, Prunus mume, Prunus mume, red jujube, sea jujube, honey jujube, olive, litchi, longan (longan), areca kernel: apple, pear, snake fruit, Begonia fruit, sand fruit, persimmon, mangosteen, black cloth forest, loquat, carambola, hawthorn, virgin fruit, figs, white fruit, Luohanguo, huolongguo, kiwifruit Melons: watermelon, melon, cantaloupe, Hami melon, papaya, papaya others: pineapple, mango, chestnut, coconut, kiwi fruit, guava, durian, banana, sugarcane, lotus seed, pomegranate, walnut
